title: Can't use the forum

replies.body: Same here...would love to if someone could replay. I know its simple and Im overlooking it.

Often times if you haven't used the Boards in quite a while, your Boards and Summoner profiles can fall out of sync. Posting a discussion such as this can force a resync and it looks like it's resolved the issue.

Happy posting!
This is the first time I use the forum and I think you're right. Thank you Targons!
